channel.title: Help server wont run
channel.description:
when i go into my runserver.bat it comes up with this
Starting special edition PimpScape BETA (C) KillaMess, Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 00 4214 5 861 2000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:29)
any idears how to fix it

item.title: Help server wont run
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

when i go into my runserver.bat it comes up with this

Starting special edition PimpScape BETA © KillaMess, Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
